author: huston.alicks
title: Decentralised maps and nfts
description: With NFTs being a hot topic, I'd like to integrate NFTs into maps/navigation.

assessments.note: The provided information is unfortunately lacking. The main idea would be interesting and could add a lot of value to the Cardano ecosystem. But in this proposal, we are lacking crucial information on how the project can be realized.
It is not clear how this proposal solves an existing problem and it is not clear how this project is going to work.
Which maps? are you providingh your own mapping solution. Or using google, apple or open maps?

Draft proposal. There was no problem in the problem statement, which makes it difficult to assess the value proposition and alignment with the challenge. The lack of a plan makes it impossible to assess the impact of the challenge and the potential for improvement for Cardano. It is important to include more details so that it is possible to give appropriate feedback.

The core idea that transpires from the very little information that was written down has the potential to go in a good direction, that would eventually lead to a wider adoption of the ecosystem. However, the proposal needs to be re-submitted in a future fund with a clear plan, budget, metrics and so on.

This proposal is likely to fail. The requests Budget of $150k is not only very high but additionally it was never explained for what it is needed. Given that sum, I would expect an adequate description on how this budget might be used. it needs more editing and a more work to make it proper assessable.
Additionally, there is no timeline presented on how long it may take to build this DApp.
As there is no information about the qualifications of the proposer and possible team behind him/her a proper assessment is not possible.

Even though the proposer has relevant experience in Phyton and Django there is no more information about the team behind the proposal or if the proposer is working alone. For 150k a more detailed description is beneficial.

There is no plan and budget for the requested funds
No detail on how this idea would be applied in the platforms where people view maps.

Draft proposal. There is no plan or objective details on the qualifications of the proposer to develop a project related to NFTs.

What exactly will be tied to the NFT? A satellite image? it is important to remember that today Google dominates this market and monetizing this type of information would involve conflict of interest.
There is no detailed description about the project in the proposal, the self described experience is not backed-up by external links that would help verify the assertions.
Roadmap and milestones are missing. There are no KPIs mentioned on which the project should be audited by. The proposal leaves one wondering what needs this DApp idea would satisfy.
the whole proposal contains only four sentences. I would recommend to have a look at other proposals and resubmit it.
Please provide a detailed plan on how this would be implemented and how you would get it into the platforms where people view maps.
Draft proposal. There is no information that allows auditability.
As stated above, the proposal should include more information regarding the detailed project, budget, roadmap and metrics. The proposer hasn't even validated the Self-Assessment checklist.

solution: Users could buy areas on the map in the form of NFTs. Users can advertise on area they own.
experience: I have experience in developing web applications using Python and the Django framework.
